product_name: Sea to Summit Trek and Travel Shampoo with Conditioner - 3 fl. oz.
long_description: Whether you're traveling around the world or spending a week in the woods, the Sea To Summit Trek and Travel Pocket shampoo with conditioner helps you keep up with your hygiene.
